books.author: by Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.
books.name: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: by William P. Barr
books.description: The former attorney general for George H.W. Bush and Donald Trump gives his account of those two tenures.
books.name: ONE DAMN THING AFTER ANOTHER

books.author: edited by Nikole Hannah-Jones, Caitlin Roper, Ilena Silverman and Jake Silverstein
books.description: Viewing America’s entanglement with slavery and its legacy, in essays adapted and expanded from The New York Times Magazine.
books.name: THE 1619 PROJECT

books.author: by Erik Larson
books.description: An examination of the leadership of the prime minister Winston Churchill.
books.name: THE SPLENDID AND THE VILE

books.author: by Michelle Zauner
books.description: The daughter of a Korean mother and Jewish-American father, and leader of the indie rock project Japanese Breakfast, describes creating her own identity after losing her mother to cancer.
books.name: CRYING IN H MART

books.author: by Stephen Galloway
books.description: An account of the marriage between Vivien Leigh and Laurence Olivier.
books.name: TRULY, MADLY

books.author: by Tara Westover
books.description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university.
books.name: EDUCATED

books.author: by Marie Yovanovitch
books.description: The former U.S. ambassador to Ukraine chronicles her career in the post-Soviet world and her testimony during the first impeachment of President Trump.
books.name: LESSONS FROM THE EDGE

books.author: by Dave Grohl
books.description: A memoir by the musician known for his work with Foo Fighters and Nirvana.
books.name: THE STORYTELLER

books.author: by bell hooks
books.description: The late feminist icon explores the causes of a polarized society and the meaning of love.
books.name: ALL ABOUT LOVE

books.author: by Alex Kershaw
books.description: The story of four soldiers who received the Medal of Honor for their service during World War II.
books.name: AGAINST ALL ODDS

books.author: by Amy Bloom
books.description: After her husband’s Alzheimer’s diagnosis, the author travels with him to Dignitas, a prominent Swiss right-to-die organization.
books.name: IN LOVE

books.author: by Robin Wall Kimmerer
books.description: A botanist and member of the Citizen Potawatomi Nation espouses having an understanding and appreciation of plants and animals.
books.name: BRAIDING SWEETGRASS

books.author: by Will Smith with Mark Manson
books.description: The actor, producer and musician tells his life story and lessons he learned along the way.
books.name: WILL

books.author: by Matthew McConaughey
books.description: The Academy Award-winning actor shares snippets from the diaries he kept over the last 35 years.
books.name: GREENLIGHTS
